name: Under Leaves
summary: Color-filled hidden object game from the world of animals. Gorgeous hand-drawn watercolor illustrations and a soothing soundscape make for a gently exotic experience. The game will take you through 6 different locations around the world where 21 animals lie, waiting to be discovered. Free of any text, the game is accessible to everyone.
